title: High School Degree
description: During my formative academic years, I attended Basic Education High School (BEHS) (5) Aungban, where I completed my high school education.

title: MBBS of University of Medicine 2 Yangon
description: I pursued studies in medicine and related subjects, currently in the 3rd MBBS year. However, my career progression has been delayed due to the impact of COVID-19 and political challenges.

title: Handong Global University
description: I successfully completed the Operating System Course at Global Handong University, earning my first international certificate in the computing field.

title: ITPEC
description: I recently obtained an ITPEC certificate from MST University, Yangon, signaling readiness to embark on a professional journey in the IT field.
